name: Bust of a Young Man
description: Bust of a Young Man; Antico (Pier Jacopo Alari-Bonacolsi) (Italian, about 1455 - 1528); Mantua, Lombardia, Italy; about 1520; Bronze with silver; 54.6 x 45 x 22.3 cm (21 1/2 x 17 11/16 x 8 3/4 in.); 86.SB.688; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Bust of a Young Man
